snippet: Mr. Platt will become chief executive of the publishing division on Nov. 1, succeeding Cameron Strang.
abstract: Music publishing company Warner/Chappell announces that Jon Platt will replace Cameron Strang as chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Platt will become chief executive of the publishing division on Nov. 1, succeeding Cameron Strang.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; New Chief Executive Named at Division of Warner Music
headline.main: Warner/Chappell Names Jon Platt Its New Chief
